title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-11.3 - Manual-maximum firing rate over seven gallons per hour
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-11.3 - Manual-maximum firing rate over seven gallons per hour

State Regulations

After the burner is manually lit the main flame shall be
continually supervised while the burner is firing. The electrical circuit to
the main fuel valve shall be automatically de-energized within four seconds
after flame failure and the de-energized valve shall automatically close within
the next five seconds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-11.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
